entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
